Question
========
  
The quantitative variable "Attitude toward abortion" was measured. Low scores mean a negative attitude, medium scores a neutral attitude and high scores a positive attitude. Most people have either a negative attitude or a positive attitude. A neutral attitude is relatively rare. What does the distribution of the variable look like? 
Answerlist
----------
* Bell-shaped
* U-shaped
* Skewed to the right
* Skewed to the left

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
